cantrips.name: Acid Splash
cantrips.description: You hurl a bubble of acid. Choose one or two creatures within range and within 5 feet of each other. A target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take 1d6 acid damage.

cantrips.name: Blade Ward
cantrips.description: You have resistance against bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage dealt by weapon attacks until the end of your next turn.

cantrips.name: Chill Touch
cantrips.description: A ghostly skeletal hand strikes at a creature. Make a ranged spell attack. On hit, 1d8 necrotic damage and the target can't regain HP until your next turn. Against undead, the target also has disadvantage on attack rolls against you.

cantrips.name: Druidcraft
cantrips.description: Create a tiny, harmless sensory effect that predicts the weather, make a flower bloom or a seed pod open, create a harmless sensory effect, or instantly light or snuff out a small flame.

cantrips.name: Eldritch Blast
cantrips.description: A beam of crackling energy streaks toward a creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack. On hit, the target takes 1d10 force damage.

cantrips.name: Fire Bolt
cantrips.description: You hurl a mote of fire at a creature or object. Make a ranged spell attack. On hit, 1d10 fire damage. A flammable object hit ignites if it isn't being worn or carried.

cantrips.name: Guidance
cantrips.description: The target can roll a d4 and add the number to one ability check of its choice. It can roll the die before or after making the check.

cantrips.name: Light
cantrips.components: V, M (a firefly or phosphorescent moss)
cantrips.description: An object you touch sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet. A creature holding the object can dismiss the effect as an action. Hostile creature: Dexterity save to avoid.

cantrips.name: Mage Hand
cantrips.description: A spectral, floating hand appears. The hand can manipulate objects, open unlocked doors, stow or retrieve items, or pour out vials. It can't attack, activate magic items, or carry more than 10 pounds.

cantrips.name: Mending
cantrips.description: This spell repairs a single break or tear in an object you touch (no larger than 1 foot in any dimension). Can physically repair a magic item but can't restore magic to such an object.

cantrips.name: Minor Illusion
cantrips.description: Create a sound or an image of an object (no larger than a 5-foot cube). The illusion can't create sound, light, smell, or sensory effects. An Investigation check against your spell save DC reveals it as an illusion.

cantrips.name: Poison Spray
cantrips.description: You project a puff of noxious gas at a creature within range. The creature must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or take 1d12 poison damage.

cantrips.name: Prestidigitation
cantrips.description: A minor magical trick: create a harmless sensory effect, light/snuff a small flame, clean/soil a small object, chill/warm/flavor nonliving material, create a small mark or symbol on a surface for 1 hour, or create a trinket/illusion that fits in your hand for one round.

cantrips.name: Produce Flame
cantrips.description: A flickering flame appears in your hand (bright light 10 ft, dim light 10 ft more). You can also hurl the flame at a creature within 30 ft: ranged spell attack for 1d8 fire damage.

cantrips.name: Ray of Frost
cantrips.description: A frigid beam of blue-white light streaks toward a creature. Make a ranged spell attack. On hit, 1d8 cold damage and the target's speed is reduced by 10 feet until the start of your next turn.

cantrips.name: Resistance
cantrips.description: The target can roll a d4 and add it to one saving throw of its choice before the spell ends.

cantrips.name: Sacred Flame
cantrips.description: Flame-like radiance descends on a creature you can see. The target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take 1d8 radiant damage. The target gains no benefit from cover for this saving throw.

cantrips.name: Shillelagh
cantrips.components: V, S, M (mistletoe, shamrock leaf, and a club or quarterstaff)
cantrips.description: A club or quarterstaff you are holding is imbued with nature's power. For the duration, you can use your spellcasting ability instead of Strength for attack and damage rolls, and the weapon's damage die becomes a d8.

cantrips.name: Spare the Dying
cantrips.description: A living creature that has 0 hit points becomes stable. This spell has no effect on undead or constructs.

cantrips.name: Thaumaturgy
cantrips.description: You manifest a minor wonder: your voice booms up to 3x louder, cause flames to flicker/brighten/dim/change color, cause tremors, create an instant sound, cause a door or window to slam open or shut, or alter the appearance of your eyes.

cantrips.name: Vicious Mockery
cantrips.description: You unleash a string of insults laced with subtle enchantments. If the target can hear you, it must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or take 1d4 psychic damage and have disadvantage on the next attack roll it makes before the end of its next turn.

level_1.name: Bless
level_1.components: V, S, M (a sprinkling of holy water)
level_1.description: You bless up to three creatures of your choice within range. Whenever a target makes an attack roll or a saving throw before the spell ends, the target can roll a d4 and add the number rolled.

level_1.name: Burning Hands
level_1.description: A thin sheet of flames shoots from your fingertips. Each creature in a 15-foot cone must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 3d6 fire damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.

level_1.name: Charm Person
level_1.description: You attempt to charm a humanoid you can see. It must make a Wisdom saving throw (advantage if you or your companions are fighting it). If it fails, it is charmed by you until the spell ends or you harm it.

level_1.name: Cure Wounds
level_1.description: A creature you touch regains a number of hit points equal to 1d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier. This spell has no effect on undead or constructs.

level_1.name: Detect Magic
level_1.description: For the duration, you sense the presence of magic within 30 feet of you. You can use your action to see a faint aura around any visible creature or object that bears magic, and you learn its school of magic.

level_1.name: Disguise Self
level_1.description: You make yourself — including your clothing, armor, weapons, and other belongings — look different. You can seem 1 foot shorter or taller and can appear thin, fat, or in between. Investigation check against your spell save DC to discern the disguise.

level_1.name: Faerie Fire
level_1.description: Each object in a 20-foot cube within range is outlined in blue, green, or violet light. Any creature in the area when the spell is cast must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or also be outlined. Attack rolls against an affected creature or object have advantage. Invisible creatures become visible.

level_1.name: Healing Word
level_1.description: A creature of your choice that you can see within range regains hit points equal to 1d4 + your spellcasting ability modifier. This spell has no effect on undead or constructs.

level_1.name: Hex
level_1.components: V, S, M (the petrified eye of a newt)
level_1.description: You place a curse on a creature that you can see within range. Until the spell ends, you deal an extra 1d6 necrotic damage to the target whenever you hit it with an attack. Also, choose one ability; the target has disadvantage on ability checks made with the chosen ability.

level_1.name: Hunter's Mark
level_1.description: You choose a creature you can see within range and mystically mark it as your quarry. Until the spell ends, you deal an extra 1d6 damage to the target whenever you hit it with a weapon attack. You also have advantage on any Wisdom (Perception) or Wisdom (Survival) check you make to find it.

level_1.name: Mage Armor
level_1.components: V, S, M (a piece of cured leather)
level_1.description: You touch a willing creature who isn't wearing armor, and a protective magical force surrounds it until the spell ends. The target's base AC becomes 13 + its Dexterity modifier.

level_1.name: Magic Missile
level_1.description: You create three glowing darts of magical force. Each dart hits a creature of your choice that you can see within range. A dart deals 1d4 + 1 force damage. The darts all strike simultaneously. At higher levels: one additional dart per slot level above 1st.

level_1.name: Shield
level_1.casting_time: 1 reaction (when hit by an attack or targeted by magic missile)
level_1.description: An invisible barrier of magical force appears and protects you. Until the start of your next turn, you have a +5 bonus to AC, including against the triggering attack, and you take no damage from magic missile.

level_1.name: Shield of Faith
level_1.components: V, S, M (a small parchment with a bit of holy text written on it)
level_1.description: A shimmering field appears and surrounds a creature of your choice within range, granting it a +2 bonus to AC for the duration.

level_1.name: Sleep
level_1.components: V, S, M (a pinch of fine sand, rose petals, or a cricket)
level_1.description: This spell sends creatures into a magical slumber. Roll 5d8; the total is how many hit points of creatures this spell can affect. Starting with the creature that has the lowest current hit points, each creature falls unconscious until the spell ends, the sleeper takes damage, or someone uses an action to shake or slap it awake.

level_1.name: Speak with Animals
level_1.description: You gain the ability to comprehend and verbally communicate with beasts for the duration. The knowledge and awareness of many beasts is limited by their intelligence, but at minimum, beasts can give you information about nearby locations and monsters.

level_1.name: Thunderwave
level_1.description: A wave of thunderous force sweeps out from you. Each creature in a 15-foot cube must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 2d8 thunder damage and is pushed 10 feet away from you. On a successful save, the creature takes half damage and isn't pushed.
